Services

While we specialize in working with Open Source and Internet Freedom Projects, we understand that every community might have different needs and aim to accommodate those in our design processes.


Visual Identity

Brand Strategy

Usability

UX Design

Print

Copywriting

Our process

We adapt to your consensus model by applying best practices in Open Source Design

01.Research

Some projects have a single contact point, while some others work with community consensus. We reseach what the best approach is and propose an action plan tailored to the specific project.

02.Iterations

We draft the first proposals and iterate based on feedback, while documenting the steps we took in the open, preferably GitHub.

03.Implementation

Once the final work is taking shape we start implementing the designs and help projects along the way if any need arises. We share our work in the open afterwards.

Have a project in mind?
